mapper.insert: insert into t_category(user_id, category_name, category_sort) values(#{userId}, #{categoryName}, #{categorySort})
mapper.select: select category_id,category_name,category_sort,parent_id from t_category where user_id = #{userId} or user_id=0 order by user_id ,category_sort asc
select category_id,category_name,category_sort from t_category where user_id=0 order by category_sort asc
